sqlMap.insert:
insert into map_request_log( x_id,x_session_id,x_action, x_type,x_entity,x_max_resend, x_now_resend,x_create_time,x_modify_time, x_request_data,x_response_data,x_username, x_talend_timestamp,x_method,x_is_success) values( request_log_seq.nextval,#sessionId#,#action#, #type#,#entity#,#maxResend#, #nowResend#,#createTime#,#modifyTime#, #requestData#,#responseData#,#userName#,0,#method#,#isSuccess#)
SELECT request_log_seq.CURRVAL AS ID FROM DUAL
